AbbyMod:Salem_Diary.NAME: Salem Diary
AbbyMod:Salem_Diary.FLAVOR: The one born under the curse of the old ones can acquire just a bit of comfort on reading those pages.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card, gain #rMadness equal to the energy spent.

AbbyMod:YogBlessing.NAME: Yog's Blessing
AbbyMod:YogBlessing.FLAVOR: In many places, it's considered a curse instead.
DESCRIPTIONS: AbbyMod:Madness threshold to generate #rQliphoth #rRhizome is now 8. Start combat with 1 #yKeyhole and -1 #yDexterity.

AbbyMod:MetalizedInsanity.NAME: Metalized Insanity
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain 2 #yBlock for every stack of #yKeyhole

AbbyMod:CosmoBattery.NAME: Cosmo's Battery
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase the maximum stacks of #yKeyholes to 4.
